title: Ahmad Shahzad Works as a Servant to Afridi; Ijaz Butt
text: 14:58 Posted by Madiha Shakeel 0 Former chairman Pakistan Cricket Board Ijaz Butt has set off another controversy by claiming that Pakistani batsman Ahmad Shahzad miss behaved with head coach Waqar Younis and in reply he slapped Ahmad Shahzad. According to a local media reports Butt speaking in a recent show said Ahmad Shahzad once disrespected Waqar Younis by calling him ‘Sifarshi’. “This infuriated Waqar so much that he slapped Shahzad,” he added. Butt also revealed that Ahmad Shahzad work for Shahid Afridi as a servant. “Ahmad Shahzad use to bring clothes and polished shoes for Shahid Afridi,” he claimed. Former PCB chairman also said that Waqar Younis gave resignation before cricket world cup 2015 and present chairman PCB Shehryar Khan requested him to help out in difficult situation. According to Butt, “I had told him (Shehzad) he was too much under the influence of Shahid Afridi and pandered to him. Waqar was very upset but I convinced him that it was not the right time to resign and he should continue,” Butt said. In reply to his allegations, Shahzad tweeted, Copyright Business Recorder, 2015
